Title: Authorizes the fiduciary of a decedent to take control of certain web site accounts of the decedent
Summary: Authorizes the fiduciary of a decedent to take control of certain web site accounts of the decedent.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the estates, powers and trusts law, in relation to authorizing the fiduciary of a decedent to take control of certain web site accounts of the decedent
